QuestData.Title: What Lies Beneath
QuestData.Description: If my suspicions are correct, this place still reels from some lingering darkness.$B$BWhatever happened here... it could not have been the natural course of events.$B$BEven the yaungol are not so brutal as to slaughter their own kind to the point of... this.$B$BI will use the totems that you brought me to perform a cleansing ritual.$B$BI need someone to assist me in the ceremony. Let me know when you are ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Yalia Sagewhisper to begin the ceremony.$B$BThen, activate the Totem of Kindness, the Totem of Tranquility, and the Totem of Serenity.
QuestData.RewardText: We look upon the true face of hatred!$B$BNow it all makes sense. This is the work of the sha.
